item.title:
R to @0xstark: 26. @Glowfnd is a platform that funds deployment & operation of new solar farms around the world, producing onchain carbon credits.
Glow currently has 95 active solar farms, producing 1,110 MWh/month.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
26. @Glowfnd is a platform that funds deployment & operation of new solar farms around the world, producing onchain carbon credits.

Glow currently has 95 active solar farms, producing 1,110 MWh/month.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: EF Treasury has deployed:
- 10,000 ETH into Spark - 10,000 ETH into Aave Prime - 20,800 ETH into Aave Core - 4,200 ETH into Compound
We're grateful for the entire Ethereum security community that has worked diligently to make Ethereum DeFi secure and usable!
item.dc:creator: @ethereumfndn
item.description:
EF Treasury has deployed:

- 10,000 ETH into Spark
- 10,000 ETH into Aave Prime
- 20,800 ETH into Aave Core
- 4,200 ETH into Compound

We're grateful for the entire Ethereum security community that has worked diligently to make Ethereum DeFi secure and usable!

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 25. @Paragraph_xyz is a publishing and newsletter platform.
Writers can earn via subscriptions, and all posts are NFTs, giving fans a new way to support writers. My fave feature is how every post displays threads discussing it found on @farcaster_xyz (open protocols are good!)
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
25. @Paragraph_xyz is a publishing and newsletter platform.

Writers can earn via subscriptions, and all posts are NFTs, giving fans a new way to support writers. My fave feature is how every post displays threads discussing it found on @farcaster_xyz (open protocols are good!)

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Today, BoLD delivers permissionless validation, making the Arbitrum ecosystem more secure and more decentralized than ever.
Anyone can defend Arbitrum.
Stage 2 soon.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 24. @ParallelTCG is a free-to-play scifi trading card game built on Ethereum.
Players compete with onchain cards representing 5 factions, competing for millions in prizes.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
24. @ParallelTCG is a free-to-play scifi trading card game built on Ethereum.

Players compete with onchain cards representing 5 factions, competing for millions in prizes.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Censorship resistance isnâ€™t just a nice to haveâ€”itâ€™s a big part of what keeps Ethereum open, neutral, and unstoppable.
Our latest post dives into how Ethereum fights back against censorship, why it matters, and the role clients like Lodestar play in keeping the network permissionless.
item.dc:creator: @lodestar_eth
item.description:
Censorship resistance isnâ€™t just a nice to haveâ€”itâ€™s a big part of what keeps Ethereum open, neutral, and unstoppable.

Our latest post dives into how Ethereum fights back against censorship, why it matters, and the role clients like Lodestar play in keeping the network permissionless.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 23. @zkemail is a suite of integrations that make it easy for developers & users to use zk superpowers with an email address.
For example: with @zkemail you can set up an ethereum account recovery process, where your guardians are simply email addresses.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
23. @zkemail is a suite of integrations that make it easy for developers & users to use zk superpowers with an email address.

For example: with @zkemail you can set up an ethereum account recovery process, where your guardians are simply email addresses.

item.title: an underrated benefit of the Pectra upgrade is that it will give Ethereum +1 gold and +1 production on all desert tiles
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description: an underrated benefit of the Pectra upgrade is that it will give Ethereum +1 gold and +1 production on all desert tiles

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 22. @Uniswap is the world's largest DEX, w/ $2.5T in lifetime volume and daily vol that competes with centralized exchanges.
v4 is now live, enabling developers to use Uniwap as a platform, where hooks allow custom pool logic, limit orders, MEV protection and more.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
22. @Uniswap is the world's largest DEX, w/ $2.5T in lifetime volume and daily vol that competes with centralized exchanges.

v4 is now live, enabling developers to use Uniwap as a platform, where hooks allow custom pool logic, limit orders, MEV protection and more.

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 21. @Opensea is an NFT marketplace founded in 2017.
The team built quietly for 3 years, laying the foundation for NFTs to grow into a huge ecosystem in 2021. Opensea and NFTs helped the public to realize that Ethereum is a platform for creators, artists, game devs, and more.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
21. @Opensea is an NFT marketplace founded in 2017.

The team built quietly for 3 years, laying the foundation for NFTs to grow into a huge ecosystem in 2021. Opensea and NFTs helped the public to realize that Ethereum is a platform for creators, artists, game devs, and more.

item.title:
RT by @0xstark: Here are the 4 steps to get started building in Ethereum, a guest thread by @PatrickAlphaC
1. Understand why 2. Take a course, learn the tools 3. Apply your knowledge 4. Continue to learn & build
Let's unpack this so you can become a monster developer or security researcher ðŸ‘‡
item.dc:creator: @ethereum
item.description:
Here are the 4 steps to get started building in Ethereum, a guest thread by @PatrickAlphaC

1. Understand why
2. Take a course, learn the tools
3. Apply your knowledge
4. Continue to learn & build

Let's unpack this so you can become a monster developer or security researcher ðŸ‘‡

item.title:
R to @0xstark: 20. @Fluidkey is an onchain privacy solution, that links your private ENS to dynamic stealth addresses, so each transaction is unique and private.
Fluidkey is compatible with a wide range of wallets, including hardware options.
item.dc:creator: @0xstark
item.description:
20. @Fluidkey is an onchain privacy solution, that links your private ENS to dynamic stealth addresses, so each transaction is unique and private.

Fluidkey is compatible with a wide range of wallets, including hardware options.
